page.title: 08 EVENTS-SOCIAL Cont....
page.content: Chardstock has recently had a Barbecue in the Playground of the School.The event was set up by the Friends of the School Association.There was an estimate of 130 people taking part.The amount of money raised was over Â£100 Village Fetes have been arranged in Various gardens, one Fete we have just recently had was the Church Fete,which raised money for a new Heating System in the church.Money from the church fete was in excess of Â£300.Jumble sales have been held in the school for school funds.The school holds an annual display day.The display contains many forms of Gymnastics and balances.A Medival Banquet was held in the old School Reading room, to raise money for the School funds.The money raised was a staggering amount of Â£100.
